name: Ninja Kingdom
description:
Join the ninja kingdom and defeat rise of The Flame and his general.

Game play:

Each round have 4 card, 2 move type card, 2 attack type card.

Move type include Pawn, Knight, King and the move is same with chess

Attack type include Bishop, Rook, Queen also move like chess

Try to mix move and attack to defeat all enemy and get fancy reward

Features:

 Weapon, Element, Skill
